search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Miro (miro.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Miro is: [https://miro.com/pricing/](https://miro.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Pricing
===============

[](https://miro.com/pricing/#)[](https://miro.com/ "Go to homepage")

[Product](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

[Solutions](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

[Resources](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

[Pricing](https://miro.com/pricing/)

Pricing
=======

#### Free

Discover what Miro can do for you and your team. Always free

$0Unlimited members

[Go to dashboard](https://miro.com/app?lng=en)

What’s included:

*   Single workspace with **3 editable boards**
*   Start faster and enhance productivity with **5,000+ Miro and community-made templates**
*   Seamlessly integrate your workflows with **160+ apps**, including Zoom, Slack, Google Drive, and Sketch
*   Use **layers** to show, hide, and group objects on the same boardnew
*   Try **Miro AI** — 10 credits/month per team new
*   Record and share **5 Talktracks** to give interactive video walkthroughs of boards

### Show key features

[](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

What’s included:

*   Single workspace with **3 editable boards**
*   Start faster and enhance productivity with **5,000+ Miro and community-made templates**
*   Seamlessly integrate your workflows with **160+ apps**, including Zoom, Slack, Google Drive, and Sketch
*   Use **layers** to show, hide, and group objects on the same boardnew
*   Try **Miro AI** — 10 credits/month per team new
*   Record and share **5 Talktracks** to give interactive video walkthroughs of boards

#### Starter

Unlock unlimited and private boards with essential features

$8/month per member/month per member

Billed annually or **$****10** if billed monthly. Excluding applicable tax.

[Buy Starter](https://miro.com/app/?createTeamPlan&lng=en&currency=usd)

All Free features, plus:

*   Create and share **unlimited boards** in a single workspace
*   Share boards publicly with **unlimited Visitors**, no sign-in required
*   Export boards in **high resolution** to JPG or PDF
*   Restore previous content with **version history**
*   Upload brand fonts or colors with **Brand Center** and create **custom templates**
*   Organize boards into project folders with **Spaces**new
*   Create, edit, and synthesize board content with **Miro AI** — 25 credits/month per membernew
*   Run interactive meetings with **Timer**, **Voting**, **Video calls**, **Private mode**, **Estimation**, and more
*   Restrict board access with **Private boards**
*   Record and share interactive video walkthroughs of boards with **unlimited Talktracks**

### Show key features

[](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

All Free features, plus:

*   Create and share **unlimited boards** in a single workspace
*   Share boards publicly with **unlimited Visitors**, no sign-in required
*   Export boards in **high resolution** to JPG or PDF
*   Restore previous content with **version history**
*   Upload brand fonts or colors with **Brand Center** and create **custom templates**
*   Organize boards into project folders with **Spaces**new
*   Create, edit, and synthesize board content with **Miro AI** — 25 credits/month per membernew
*   Run interactive meetings with **Timer**, **Voting**, **Video calls**, **Private mode**, **Estimation**, and more
*   Restrict board access with **Private boards**
*   Record and share interactive video walkthroughs of boards with **unlimited Talktracks**

Best for teams and consultants

#### Business

Safely collaborate with secure guest access, multiple teams and advanced tools

$16/month per member/month per member

Billed annually or **$****20** if billed monthly. Excluding applicable tax.

[Try it free](https://miro.com/app/?createBusinessPlan&lng=en&currency=usd)or [Purchase now](https://miro.com/app/?createBusinessPlanYearly&lng=en&currency=usd)

All Starter features, plus:

*   Create and share **unlimited boards** in multiple private **workspaces**, customized for each team or client
*   Invite **unlimited Guests** to securely collaborate with clients or partners, sign-in required
*   Create, edit, and synthesize board content with **Miro AI** — 50 credits/month per membernew
*   Visualize processes and systems with **3,600+ diagramming shapes** and icons from UML, AWS, Azure, ERD, and more, or upload **custom shapes**new
*   Map and prioritize tasks across teams with two-way Jira or Azure sync using **Dependencies** and **Planner**
*   Secure and simplify access with **Single Sign On (SSO)** through OKTA, OneLogin, Auth0, and more

### Show key features

[](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

All Starter features, plus:

*   Create and share **unlimited boards** in multiple private **workspaces**, customized for each team or client
*   Invite **unlimited Guests** to securely collaborate with clients or partners, sign-in required
*   Create, edit, and synthesize board content with **Miro AI** — 50 credits/month per membernew
*   Visualize processes and systems with **3,600+ diagramming shapes** and icons from UML, AWS, Azure, ERD, and more, or upload **custom shapes**new
*   Map and prioritize tasks across teams with two-way Jira or Azure sync using **Dependencies** and **Planner**
*   Secure and simplify access with **Single Sign On (SSO)** through OKTA, OneLogin, Auth0, and more

#### Enterprise

Work across your entire organization, with support, security and control, to scale

Custom price — from **30 members**

[Contact us](https://miro.com/contact/sales/?lead_source=Pricing&subject=company_plan)

All Business features, plus:

*   **Flexible license program** scales Miro licenses with your usage, no extra fees or contract changes
*   Simplify admin tasks with **SCIM**, **request management**, **billing groups**, and more
*   **Centralized account management and insights** for adoption and usage
*   **Organization-wide controls** for Miro and third-party app integrations
*   **Ensure enterprise-grade security** with SSO, domain control, data classification, 2FA and more
*   **Add-on Enterprise Guard** for advanced data security and governance features
*   Choose where to host your data with **Miro’s data center residency program**
*   Engage with Miro's Customer Success Program
*   Access **premium 24/7 support, and guaranteed SLAs**
*   Fast-track innovation with **Miro AI plus organization-wide or team-specific AI controls** — 100 credits/month per membernew

### Show key features

[](https://miro.com/pricing/#)

Security and compliance
=======================

Rest easy knowing we're fully certified by numerous organizations.

[Learn more](https://miro.com/security/)

![Image 46](https://static-website.miro.com/miro-site-lp-build-assets/assets/pricing/canvas24/iso.svg)

ISO/IEC Security Management

![Image 47](https://static-website.miro.com/miro-site-lp-build-assets/assets/pricing/canvas24/soc2.svg)

Education
---------

Support for staff and students of educational institutions.

[Learn more](https://miro.com/education-whiteboard)

![Image 52: shape](https://static-website.miro.com/miro-site-lp-build-assets/assets/pricing/canvas24/education.png)

### **How do I get started?**

When you sign up, you’re on the Free plan by default. The Free plan is designed for teams just starting out with visual collaboration: you can invite as many team members and create as many boards as you want, but only 3 boards will be active and editable at once. For more advanced collaboration functionality, check out our Starter, Business or Enterprise plans.

### **What is included with the Free plan?**

The Free plan enables you to experience the power of visual collaboration firsthand: with unlimited team members, 3 active boards, and access to all our pre-built templates as well as a set of robust integrations including Google Drive, Slack, and more.

### **Can I change the team size?**

Yes, you can change your team size at any point during your subscription. You’ll be charged a prorated fee for adding new users and a refund on your next payment for removing users.

### **How can I increase Miro AI credits?**

Miro AI credits are calculated based on the number of licenses in the organisation and your Miro plan (Starter/Business/Enterprise). You can purchase an add-on to get unlimited credits. Credit limit cannot be increased for Free plan. Check out our [help center](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017571714-Miro-billing#h_4c2c9e4e-4b7e-4b1b-8d8f-7c2d4c4f3e1b) for more information.

### **Does everyone need a Miro account to collaborate?**

No, if you are using Miro on Starter or Business plan, you can invite anonymous visitors to your public boards.  
[Learn more](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360012524559-Collaboration-with-External-Guest-Editors).

### **Does Miro integrate with my existing workflow?**

We have a full list of integrations through our Marketplace here. If you don’t see a tool for your workflow on the list or have an idea,  
[let us know](https://miro.com/contact/product/?subject=integrations).

### **Is my data secure?**

We care deeply about data privacy and security and strive to keep our security practices industry-leading. Learn more about data security on our website, check out our assessment on the Cloud Security Alliance website, or contact us directly with any questions.

### **We need additional help on documentation (like an MSA or security questionnaire). Who can I reach out to?**

We’re happy to work together on your company’s security questionnaire or an MSA! Please reach out to our sales team at  
[miro.com/contact/sales](https://miro.com/contact/sales/) for specific questions.

### **My team is a nonprofit organization. Is special pricing available for NPOs or charitable organizations?**

If you're part of a nonprofit organization, we're happy to provide you with discounted pricing. [Find out more](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360026839633-NPO-Subscriptions)  
about the eligibility requirements.

### **What forms of payment do you accept?**

We accept all major credit cards. If you purchase Starter Plan for 10+ members or Business Plan you can pay via self-serve invoice. If you want to purchase Enterprise Plan, [contact us](https://miro.com/contact/), and we will issue an invoice that you can pay via bank transfer.

### **I am a staff member or student of an educational institution.**

To apply for a free Education account, fill out the  
[application form](https://miro.com/education/) on our website. [Learn more](https://help.miro.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017730473-Education-Plan).
